place.name: THORNE ST MARGARET
place.gazetteerText: THORNE-ST. MARGARET, a parish in Wellington district, Somerset; 2½ miles W of Wellington r. station. Post town, Wellington, Somerset. Acres, 805. Real property, £1,042. Pop., 144. Houses, 33. The manor belongs to J.Luxmore, Esq. The living is a vicarage in the diocese of Bath and Wells. Value, £113. Patron, the Archdeacon of Taunton. The church is old. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
